name: Facade (itch)
description:
Athmospheric story set in a post-acolyptical world.

"We used to travel the stars, but in a blink of an eye, the ashes covered the earth.

An old space rocket might lead us to a better world."

It was made in 48h for the MiniLD28.

Ludum Dare entry :

http://www.ludumdare.com/compo/minild-48/?action=preview&uid=24241

PLEASE NOTE : Play this in resolution 1280 * 1024 or higher or you might have trouble with some text display. If you can't use this resolution, feel free to leave a comment and I'll try to fixe this.
Also note that this game uses sound and music, headphones recommended.

Thanks for playing !
